library(partykit)
t=ctree(avaxhoaxid ~ AT_Alyssa_Milano+
                     #AT_FLOTUS+
                     #AT_amyschumer+
                     AT_BarackObama+
                     AT_MichelleObama+
                     AT_CNN+
                     AT_nytimes+
                     #AT_Oprah+
                     AT_YouTube+
                     #AT_piersmorgan+
                     #AT_elonmusk+
                     AT_BillGates+
                     factor(atnumLT4)+
                     #AT_aplusk+
                     #AT_ArianaGrande +
                     AT_realDonaldTrump
                    
                          , data = wide)

plot(t)
t
mean(predict(t) == wide$avaxhoaxid, na.rm = TRUE)

wide_res = wide %>% mutate(ok=predict(t) == wide$avaxhoaxid)
wide_res %>% group_by(avaxhoaxid) %>% summarise(mean(ok, na.rm = TRUE))
